column4: eh, Im shrinking a 400gb partition to 200gb using Gparted, about 15 minutes later nothing has happend as such. Is it meant to be this slow :/
it took me a few hours
its better safe (takes it time) than sorry (corruption)
Yeah I know, but I googled it and there are heaps of horror stories about nothing happining after 60 hours =/ besides I used clonezille to backup everything so it's not total loss if I stop it.
